content: 2 at the beginning of every new row 8 try the jumper on your pup be warned this might take a few goes to get right you will probably need to increase less than you first think 9 make plain rounds remembering to turn your work at the end of each round 🄳 until the work in the main colour measures you may not see that the piece is too big until you have worked a couple of plain rounds so keep trying on 🄴 10 using your swatch count how many stitches are needed to make this number is referred to as x half this number which is referred to as y 11 turn chain 2 work y double_crochet sts chain x -2 and skip x sts continue adding 1 double_crochet into each stitch until you have x + y sts remaining chain x -2 and skip x sts work y double_crochet join with a slip_stitch a sorry if this sounds complicated i wasn t sure how else to write it but 🄴 basically if space between front legs = 8 sts make 4 of these at the beginning of the round and the other 4 and the end so the midpoint between the dog s legs is the beginning of the round the leg hole will both be made by chaining 6 sts 8 - 2 and skipping 8 sts 12 work one plain round adding 1 double_crochet to each stitch including the back bumps of the chain sts 13 try the jumper on your pup again at this point be sure the fit isn t too loose around your dog s body crochet has a habit of stretching 14 for the next round decrease continue making 1 double_crochet in each st until two sts remain decrease a if you have a whippet type dog with rounded ribs you can decrease like this for the next few rounds otherwise just the one decrease round should be enough b if 2 decreases per round isn t quick enough you can always add more 15 continue working plain rounds until the under belly strap is as long as you like for boys i recommend going shorter even just a few inches will be plenty for smaller dogs especially with the added security from the leg straps and it means the jumper will keep clean section 3 jumper flap 16 when you are happy with the length of the belly strap count the stitches around and divide that number by 4 referred to as z loosely slip_stitch z sts chain 2 and make z double_crochet sts twice leaving z sts unworked 17 *turn chain 2 and work 1 double_crochet in each st * repeat between * s until the work in 🄵 the main colour measures if adding leg straps do not cut the yarn section 4 finishing touches leg straps i love the addition of the leg straps and hope you do to they really improve the fit and the
